string.text: As a child, you were always fascinated by the arcane. You would spend hours watching the court mages at work, your eyes wide with wonder as they summoned fire and ice with a flick of their wrists. You would often sneak into the library to read their spellbooks, even though you couldn't understand a word of what was written.

Accepted into a mage’s guild at a young age, you spent your days poring over scrolls and learning the intricacies of the arcane arts. Though your practical experience was limited, your theoretical knowledge was vast.
A terrible plague swept through your home, and while others fled, you stayed to help. Whether through alchemy or magic, you saved lives, earning the gratitude of many.
Through rigorous study and practice, you became an expert in a single element—fire, frost, or lightning. Your spells in this domain are potent and feared.
